snippet: James (Whitey) Bulger, Boston’s most notorious gangster, was sentenced for crimes including 11 murders, racketeering, extortion and money laundering, and will most likely end his days behind bars.
abstract: James (Whitey) Bulger, Boston's most notorious gangster, receives two life sentences plus five years for his crimes, including 11 murders, racketeering, extortion and money laundering; Judge Denise J Casper, before announcing the sentence, denounces Bulger for the scope and callousness of his depravity.
lead_paragraph: James (Whitey) Bulger, Boston’s most notorious gangster, was sentenced for crimes including 11 murders, racketeering, extortion and money laundering, and will most likely end his days behind bars.

headline.main: Crime Boss Bulger Gets 2 Life Terms and Is Assailed by Judge for His ‘Depravity’
headline.print_headline: Crime Boss Bulger Gets 2 Life Terms and Is Assailed by Judge for His ‘Depravity’
